cause.description:
So many people die from car crashes every year because of injuries that could have been prevented if they were just wearing a seat belt. Hopefully if the word is spread lives can be spared.
This cause was made on behalf of Allison Justiss. Rest in peace.
1. everyone should always wear a seat belt
cause.mission: to get EVERYONE to wear their seat belts while they are in the car.
cause.name: Wear your seat belt
